quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought. If a man speaks or acts with an evil thought, pain follows him. If a man speaks or acts with a pure thought, happiness follows him, like a shadow that never leaves him.
author: Buddha

quote: All who would win joy, must share it; happiness was born a twin.
author: Lord Byron

quote: And love is two misfortunes which together happiness are.
author: Charles de LEUSSE

quote: Annual income twenty pounds, annual expenditure nineteen six, result happiness. Annual income twenty pounds, annual expenditure twenty pound ought and six, result misery.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Being happiness doesn't a mean you got every things but it means you find a way to achieve your desire things.
author: Prakash Adhikari

quote: But be, as you have been, my happiness...
author: Randall Jarrell

quote: Do not pursue what is illusory - property and position all that is gained at the expense of your nerves decade after decade and can be confiscated in one fell night. Live with a steady superiority over life - don't be afraid of misfortune, and do not yearn after happiness it is after all, all the same the bitter doesn't last forever, and the sweet never fills the cup to overflowing.
author: Alexander Solzhenitsyn

quote: Every age has its happiness and troubles.
author: Jeanne Calment

quote: Happiness a good bank account, a good cook and a good digestion.
author: Jean Jacques Rousseau

quote: Happiness comes only when we push our brains and hearts to the farthest reaches of which we are capable.
author: Leo C. Rosten
